name: ai-design-components
description: Comprehensive UI/UX component design skills for AI-assisted development

plugins.name: ui-foundation-skills
plugins.description: Foundational design system including tokens and theming for consistent styling across all components

plugins.name: ui-data-skills
plugins.description: Data visualization, tables, and dashboard components for displaying and analyzing data

plugins.name: ui-input-skills
plugins.description: Form systems, search, and filter components for user input and data collection

plugins.name: ui-interaction-skills
plugins.description: Interactive components including AI chat interfaces, drag-drop functionality, and feedback systems

plugins.name: ui-structure-skills
plugins.description: Navigation, layout, and timeline components for app structure and organization

plugins.name: ui-content-skills
plugins.description: Media management and user onboarding components for content-rich experiences

plugins.name: ui-assembly-skills
plugins.description: Capstone skill for assembling component outputs into unified, production-ready systems with token validation and framework scaffolding

plugins.name: backend-data-skills
plugins.description: Database and data storage: relational, vector, time-series, document, graph, plus data ingestion

plugins.name: backend-api-skills
plugins.description: API development, messaging, and real-time communication

plugins.name: backend-ai-skills
plugins.description: AI/ML data engineering and model serving
